pr_title: [JENKINS-62421] Added aria-labels to username & password input fields

timeline.message:
[JENKINS-62421] Added aria-labels to username & password input fields

Since we want to keep the clean aspect while improving accessibility, we opt for aria-labels instead of labels

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                aria-label="Username"
          
          
            
                                aria-label="${%Username}"
          
      
    
    
  

This makes the aria-label localizable, and actually reuses translations for the placeholder.
Not sure whether the latter is a good idea though.
timeline.author: daniel-beck

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                aria-label="Password"
          
          
            
                                aria-label="${%Password}"
          
      
    
    
  

As above.
